wordpressPage.title: About
wordpressPage.content:
I am a freelance developer with nine-plus years of experience working as a WordPress expert and has helped many clients around the world by building their online presence through high-quality custom themes and plugins.

Worked well under a tight deadline – competent understanding of our development methodology, which has been difficult to find amongst other freelancers. Hope to be working with Zakir again on a project soon.

I’ve worked with Zakir for several years now. He is able to work with very little supervision if you just provide PSDs. That saves me time. Thanks again Zakir!

Highlights

  • Front-end skills – WordPress theme+Plugin development, Static site development,Â  JavaScript, React, Gatsby, SASS, Bootstrap, Bulma, Styled Components, CSS-in-JS, jQuery etc.
  • Back-end skills – Node, PHP, MYSQL, GraphQL, Firebase, Git, Apache/Nginx, API integration.
  • CMS – WordPress, Netlify CMS, Prismic CMS, Strapi
  • Experience with modern build processes with Webpack.
  • Master’s degree in Software Engineering.

Our experience with Zakir was tremendous – he helped us completely redesign our site this past summer. He was able to complete complex tasks and integrate several large plugins, and he was also very honest when he thought there was a better way to accomplish a certain task. Zakir always has your best interest in mind!

Core services

Static site with Gatsby – Set up WordPress as a headless CMS to build content, then render the content ( including posts, pages, menus, media, advanced custom fields ) with GraphQL. Code repository is usually either GitHub or GitLab and can be hosted on Netlify.

WordPress theme development – Usually, the client sends me PSD/Sketch/Zeplin/XD and I develop a complete WordPress theme from scratch either using Sage or Themeco Pro theme.

Single Page Application (SPA) in React with Firebase.

E-commerce site development with WooCommerce. Features include: Bookings/Subscriptions/Memberships/Drop-shipping/Affiliate Store/Paid Job Listings/Marketplace.

WordPress/WooCommerce plugin development – Bring your plugin idea and I will implement it for you.

Awesome developer. He helped me work through my issues quickly and professionally. He is very communicative and has expert knowledge about wordpress. I was really happy with his services.
